[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    1,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        4,
                    ),
                    right: ConstFetch {
                        target: Static,
                        constant: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                14,
                            ),
                            value: "foo",
                        },
                    },
                },
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                17,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
